attributes.action: Stop the deportation of Cricketer Hartley Alleyne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hartley Alleyne has played cricket for the West Indies, Kent, Buckinghamshire and Worcestershire and has worked at St Edmund's school, Canterbury for two years. 

The Home Office has turned down his request for a work permit because he does not have an NVQ Level 3. 
He has lived in the UK for 29 years and is married with children. 

What better qualification could he have to coach cricket?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
